title: FS2004 - Ultimate Scenery and Aircraft Package
description:
This is a scenery and aircraft package for Flight Simulator 2004. With its 7.85GB you're sure to get a truckload of the best payware addons completely free!

These sceneries are meant for FS9, though some will be compatible with FSX too. As I didn't pay close attention to this I can't give any certainty as to which sceneries or aircraft are.

The Sceneries included are:

- Aerosoft - Austria Professional 2004
- Aerosoft - Brussels 2007
- Aerosoft - Budapest 2007
- Aerosoft - Casablanca 2005
- Aerosoft - German Airports 1, 3 and 4 (boxed versions)
- Aerosoft - German Airports 2 - Cologne-Bonn
- Aerosoft - German Airports 2 - Hannover
- Aerosoft - German Airports 2 - Dortmund
- Aerosoft - German Airports 2 - Leipzig-Halle
- Aerosoft - German Airports 3 - Hamburg
- Aerosoft - German Airports 3 - Paderborn-Lippstadt
- Aerosoft - Ibiza Formentera
- Aerosoft - Islands of Malta
- Aerosoft - Kos 2005
- Aerosoft - Lisbon 2008
- Aerosoft - Mallorca 2005
- Aerosoft - Marseille 2005
- Aerosoft - Mega Airport Frankfurt
- Aerosoft - Mega Airport London Heathrow
- Aerosoft - Mega Airport Madrid Barajas
- Aerosoft - Mega Airport Paris Charles de Gaulle
- Aerosoft - Mega Airport Stockholm Arlanda
- Aerosoft - Real Germany 3
- Aerosoft - Scenery Germany Bremen
- Aerosoft - Spanish Airports 2
- Aerosoft - Spanish Airports 3
- Armi Project - VTBS 2009
- Blueprint Simulations - KIND
- Blueprint Simulations - KMSP
- Blueprint Simulations - KSDF
- Blueprint Simulations - KMEM
- Blueprint Simulations - CYUL
- Davor Puljevic - Dubrovnik International
- Davor Puljevic - Split International
- Davor Puljevic - Zagreb International
- Dreamfactory Studio - Geneva Cointrin
- FlyLogic - Sion 2005
- FlyTampa - Dubai
- FlyTampa - Kai Tak
- FlyTampa - Miami
- FlyTampa - San Fransisco
- FlyTampa - Saint Martin / Sint Maarten / The Carribean
- FlyTampa - Vienna
- FranceVFR - Pyrenees Atlantiques Basepack
- FranceVFR - Pyrenees Atlantiques Autogen Pack
- FranceVFR - Mediterranee Basepack
- FranceVFR - Riviera Basepack
- FranceVFR - Riviera Autogen Pack
- FranceVFR - Baie du Mont-St-Michel
- FranceVFR - Beaune
- FranceVFR - FlightAlpes Basepack Sud
- FranceVFR - Guadeloupe
- FranceVFR - Lille Lesquin
- FranceVFR - Mayotte
- FranceVFR - Rennes St-Jacques
- FranceVFR - Reunion
- FranceVFR - St-Cyr Versailles
- FSDreamteam - Chicago O'Hare + Zurich
- FSAddon - Grenoble Isere
- FSAddon - Vancouver
- IGFly - Moscow Domodedovo
- ImagineSim - Atlanta
- ImagineSim - Charlotte
- ImagineSim - Washington
- ImagineSim - New York La Guardia
- ImagineSim - Nassau
- ImagineSim - San Juan
- OceanFlight Sim - Mega Hubs USA
- Overland - Tokyo Narita
- SimuDesign - Paris Le Bourget + Orly
- Simwings - Nice Cote d'Azur
- SwedFlight PRO - Pack #2 (ESSB-ESGJ-ESMK)
- SwedFlight PRO - Pack #3 (ESNN-ESNU-ESPA)
- SwedFlight PRO - Pack #4 (ESMX-ESGP-ESKN)
- SwedFlight PRO - Pack #5 (EKCH)
- TropicalSim - Brazil Full Package
- TropicalSim - Curacao
- TropicalSim - Daytona Beach Intl
- TropicalSim - Rio de Janeiro Galeao Intl
- VirtualCol - Colombia and Central America Full Package
- VirtualCol - La Aurora

The Aircraft included are:

- Aeroworx - Beechcraft King Air 200
- Carenado - Cessna C172N Skyhawk II
- Eaglesoft - Cessna Citation X
- PMDG - Boeing 737-600 + -700
- PMDG - Boeing 737-800 + -900 (will work without the -600 and -700!)
- PMDG - Boeing 747-400 Queen of the Skies
- PMDG - Beechcraft 1900
- PSS - Boeing 777
- VirtualCol - Fokker 50

And some extras:

- Aerosoft - AES v1.99b (including a few serials, can't promise them to work)
- AIRAC 0903 (complete package)
- Flight1 - Flight Environment


PLEASE KEEP SEEDING AFTER COMPLETING THE DOWNLOAD!!! Thanks in advance!
